answers.answer: This is my second gd baby I git diagnosed with my youngest son at the normal 28 weeks its not hard just make sure you eat your carbs with plenty of protein. I got diagnosed this time around 10 weeks they test early if you have a history of it. My numbers are perfect. If you have a good nutritionist you will be just fine. If you have any more questions feel free to message me:) oh I'm 15w2d and have lost 6 lb which is a pulse for the diet. I'm also over weight

question: Just got a call from my doctor that my second 3 hour glucose test is positive and the sugar levels a little high.Going to the nutritionist tomorrow to setup a plan.Any of you ladies in this predicament?  How are you doing? I am a plus size mom so this is going to be hard. :(
title: gestational diabetes :(
